briefDescription: Grameen Shiksha Avam Sahayata Association (GSASA) is a Registered N.G.O. Under Societies Registration Act. Grameen Shiksha Avam Sahayata Association is also registered with income Tax Department Under Section 80G(5) of the income Tax Act of 1961read with 12A(b) and 12A(c) vide Letter No. DIT (E) 2008-09/ G-1007/3071 Dated 28.01.2008.Grameen Shiksha Avam Sahayata Association is working in the field of rural development & social welfare. Our main objectives are uplifting the socio-economic condition of neglected and weaker sections of the community.
